item.title: Meta Bans 2 Million Instagram, Facebook, WhatsApp Accounts—Here’s Why
item.description: Meta has banned 2 million Facebook, Instagram, and WhatsApp accounts in 2024 in an effort to combat fraud on its platforms.

item.title: KDE Is Developing Its Own Flagship Linux Distro, But Why?
item.description: The KDE community is creating an in-house, flagship Linux distribution. Nope, it's not KDE Neon! And it uses Arch, btw...

item.title: 5 Reasons Why Your ‘Type’ Isn’t Working For You—By A Psychologist
item.description: Your “type” isn’t a life sentence—it’s a starting point. And sometimes, taking the road less taken might lead you to your desired destination.

item.title: Disney’s Live-Action ‘Snow White’ Looks Absolutely Dreadful
item.description: This is not how you remake a beloved classic.

item.title: Jaguar's Risky Gamble: Rebooting A Legacy Brand For The Future
item.description: Jaguar's recent rebrand has ignited a firestorm within the automotive industry. It's risky, it's bold and it may just work
